alert.note: Alert for Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yadkin County through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buck Shoals, or 10 miles southwest of Yadkinville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... East Bend... Nebo... Courtney... Buck Shoals... Huntsville... and Brooks Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
